description:
Erection of three storey roof extension on third, fourth and fifth levels to provide seven live/work units and refurbishment of existing building for 1260sq.m. B1 use. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  A000, 001, 002, 003, 004, 005                         A110, 111, 112, A101, 103, 104 and                         106.
site_name: C E G B Grid Substation
decision_conditions: The proposal, by reason of it's scale, bulk and design is considered to relate unsatisfactorily with the host building and fails to respect the built form of the surrounding streetscape, resulting in a dominant, discordant and obtrusive feature in the street scene and the locality generally and if visible from the City Basin would adversely affect and interupt the present views from Duncan Terrace Conservation Area, contary to policies Env1,D1,D2A and D9 of the Council's Unitary Development Plan, First Review, Revised Plan, Second Deposit Version 2000.
